issue.title: [C++/R] arrow_exports.h contains structs declared as class
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9589](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9589). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is an issue in an MSVC-based toolchain.

comments.body:
